pages.title: Eating Healthy
pages.text: Eating a balanced diet can really improve your health - which is important for an Adventurer and Survivalist.$()$(br2)For every five unique foods you eat you will gain 2 additional (mostly) permanent hearts of health$(br2)This can increase your health up to a maximum of $(l)10$() additional hearts$(br2)
A Food Book can help you keep track of how close you are to your next heart increase.$(br2)Eat Healthy!$(br2)
